Title: Noodle Time: Bonus
Description:
Hello, $n. Think you're a truly extraordinary noodle chef?

Let's see what you've got!
ObjectivesText: Queue for a shift at the Halfhill noodle stand, then complete the bonus objective.
PortraitTurnInText: You truly are an amazing Noodle Chef! Keep up the good work!

Objectives.Text: Queue for your next shift through Sungshin Ironpaw
Complete the bonus objective during the scenario: Noodle Time
